item.title: Navajo Joe
item.description: Navajo Joe is a 1966 Spaghetti Western film, directed by Sergio Corbucci, and stars Burt Reynolds as the titular Navajo Indian who opposes a group of bandits responsible for killing his tribe.

item.title: Stranger in Sacramento
item.description: Stranger in Sacramento or Uno straniero a Sacramento is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Bergonzelli. It was based on the novel I Will Kill You Tomorrow by Jim Murphy.

item.title: Death Sentence
item.description: Death Sentence is a 1968 spaghetti western directed by Mario Lanfranchi and starring Richard Conte.
